籤詩版本二:
Tafi kai tsaye zuwa ginin biyu don ɓoye, kewaye da kurmin ƙaya
Tian Gaojun yana da tsawon rai da gajeriyar rayuwa, sami nasara ɗaya kuma ya rasa mutane biyu.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram alama ce ta adana abubuwa da kuma canzawa a kowane lokaci.
Komai zai yi kyau idan kun jira lokacin da ya dace.
解曰: Kamar shaye-shaye. Ku kasance masu ra'ayin mazan jiya. Jira har sai lokacin ya zo. Babu bala'i, babu laifi.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Dutsen Zhang Liangyin
A cikin daular Han, Zhang Liang, wanda sunansa Zifang, ɗan Koriya ne, kuma kakanninsa na ƙarni biyar duk firayim minista ne na Koriya.
Lokacin da kasar Qin ta lalata kasar Koriya ta Kudu, Zhang Liang ya tarwatsa dukiyoyin da yake da shi, ya boye, yana son daukar fansa ga Koriya ta Kudu, sai ya aika da wani katafaren karfe a jikinsa. Da ya kai hari Qin Shihuang a Bolangsha (yanzu gundumar Yuanyang, lardin Henan), ya bugi mataimakin motar da gangan. Sarkin farko ya so kama Zhang Liang a duk fadin kasar, amma ya kasa kama shi tsawon watanni goma.
Daga baya, Zhang Liang ya taimaki Sarkin Han wajen hada kan duniya. Bayan nasararsa, ya ƙi a ba shi lada kuma ya nada wani jami'i, kuma a ƙarƙashin sunan koyon Taoism daga Chisongzi (mai mutuwa).
聖意: Yi addu'a don albarka a gida da kuma lafiyar kanku (jinkirin sa'a kawai za a iya bayyana shi ta hanyar alheri) Neman dukiya abu ne na al'ada (ka guje wa) ciniki zai yi nasara ( jira minti daya) Aure bai dace da Liujia ba, sa'a lokacin tafiya zuwa gona, tsutsotsin siliki rabin alheri ne, Dabbobi shida masu wadata (rashin kasa), neman mutane, hana shari’ar jama’a, asara, hijira ta alheri (rashin sa’a) ) Asarar dukiya, rashin lafiya, addu’a a kan duwatsu da kaburbura.
